verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, in the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, on the first <WH259> day of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8145> year <WH8141> after they were come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH5375> ye the sum <WH7218> of all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, every male <WH2145>, by their polls <WH1538>;

from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that are able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635> in Israel <WH3478>, thou and Aaron <WH175> shall number <WH6485> them by their hosts <WH6635>.
And with you there shall be a man <WH376> of every <WH376> tribe <WH4294>; every one <WH376> head <WH7218> of his fathers <WH1>' house <WH1004>.
And these are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> that shall stand <WH5975> with you <WH7205>. Of Reuben: Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur <WH7707>.
Of Simeon <WH8095>: Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai <WH6701>.
Of Judah <WH3063>: Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab <WH5992>.
Of Issachar <WH3485>: Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar <WH6686>.
Of Zebulun <WH2074>: Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon <WH2497>.
Of the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>: Of Ephraim <WH669>: Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>. Of Manasseh <WH4519>: Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur <WH6301>.
Of Benjamin <WH1144>: Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni <WH1441>.
Of Dan <WH1835>: Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai <WH5996>.
Of Asher <WH836>: Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ochran <WH5918>.
Of Gad <WH1410>: Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel <WH1845>.
Of Naphtali <WH5321>: Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan <WH5881>.

These are they that were <WH7148> called <WH7121> of the congregation <WH5712>, the princes <WH5387> of the tribes <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1>; they were the heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of <WH1992> Israel <WH3478>.
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> these men <WH582> that are mentioned <WH5344> by name <WH8034>:

And they assembled <WH6950> all the congregation <WH5712> together <WH6950> on the first <WH259> day of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>; and they declared their pedigrees <WH3205> after their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, by their polls <WH1538>.
As Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so he numbered <WH6485> them in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>, Israel <WH3478>'s first-born <WH1060>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, by their polls <WH1538>, every male <WH2145> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Reuben <WH7205>, were forty <WH705> and six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, those that were numbered <WH6485> thereof <WH4557>, according to the number of the names <WH8034>, by their polls <WH1538>, every male <WH2145> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Simeon <WH8095>, were fifty <WH2572> and nine <WH8672> thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Gad <WH1410>, were forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Judah <WH3063>, were threescore <WH7657> and fourteen <WH702> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Issachar <WH3485>, were fifty <WH2572> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Zebulun <WH2074>, were fifty <WH2572> and seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>, namely <WH1121>, of the children of Ephraim <WH669>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Ephraim <WH669>, were forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Manasseh <WH4519>, were thirty <WH7970> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Benjamin <WH1144>, were thirty <WH7970> and five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Dan <WH1835>, were threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Asher <WH836>, were forty <WH705> and one <WH259> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.

Of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321>, their generations <WH8435>, by their families <WH4940>, by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, according to the number <WH4557> of the names <WH8034>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635>;
those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4294>, of the tribe of Naphtali <WH5321>, were fifty <WH2572> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>.

These are they that were numbered <WH6485>, whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> numbered <WH6485>, and the princes <WH5387> of Israel <WH3478>, being twelve <WH6240> men <WH376>: they were each <WH376> one <WH259> for his fathers <WH1>' house <WH1004>.

So all they that were numbered <WH6485> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, all that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war <WH6635> in Israel <WH3478>;
even all they that were numbered <WH6485> were six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.
But the Levites <WH3881> after the tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> were not numbered <WH6485> among them <WH8432>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Only the tribe <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878> thou shalt not number <WH6485>, neither shalt thou take <WH5375> the sum <WH7218> of them among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>;

but appoint <WH6485> thou the Levites <WH3881> over the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>, and over all the furniture <WH3627> thereof <WH5375>, and over all that belongeth to it: they shall bear the tabernacle <WH4908>, and all the furniture <WH3627> thereof <WH8334>; and they shall minister unto it <WH2583>, and shall encamp round about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And when the tabernacle <WH4908> setteth forward <WH5265>, the Levites <WH3881> shall take it down <WH3381>; and when the tabernacle <WH4908> is to be pitched <WH2583>, the Levites <WH3881> shall set it up <WH6965>: and the stranger <WH2114> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall pitch their tents <WH2583>, every man <WH376> by his own camp <WH4264>, and every man <WH376> by his own standard <WH1714>, according to their hosts <WH6635>.

But the Levites <WH3881> shall encamp <WH2583> round about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>, that there be no wrath <WH7110> upon the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: and the Levites <WH3881> shall keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>.
Thus did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; according to all that Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so did they <WH6213>.
